velruse¶

class AuthenticationComplete(profile=None, credentials=None, provider_name=None, provider_type=None)[source]¶

An AuthenticationComplete context object

class AuthenticationDenied(reason=None, provider_name=None, provider_type=None)[source]¶

An AuthenticationDenied context object. Used when the provider returned successfully but without proper credentials. This may be the case if the user cancels the login.

login_url(request, name)[source]¶

Generate the login URL for a provider.
